alert.note: Alert for Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 10:12PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Boyd, southeastern Greenup and Carter Counties through 1045 PM EST... At 1010 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Denton, or near Grayson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grayson, Grayson Lake State Park, Princess, Coalton, Denton, Gesling, Oldtown, Naples, Rush, Grahn, Hopewell, Willard and Hitchins. This includes Interstate 64 in Kentucky between mile markers 162 and 184. TIME...MOT...LOC 0310Z 270DEG 110KT 3829 8282 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
